trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class from which <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref>, <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"></xref> are derived.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref> classe da qual base <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"> </xref>, e <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"> </xref> são derivadas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] During its execution, a workflow instance emits three kinds of tracking events to the runtime tracking infrastructure: activity status events, user events, and workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Durante sua execução, uma instância de fluxo de trabalho emite três tipos de eventos de rastreamento para a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução: eventos de status de atividade, eventos de usuário e eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure tries to match these events with track points in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução tenta corresponder a esses eventos com pontos de controle em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Whenever the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a track point, it sends a tracking record that contains data associated with both the track point and the tracking event to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução corresponde a um ponto de controle, ele envia um registro de rastreamento que contém os dados associados com o ponto de controle e o evento de rastreamento para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: There are three kinds of tracking record that the runtime tracking infrastructure can send: an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>, and a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Há três tipos de registro de rastreamento que pode enviar a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução: um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Each kind of tracking record derives from the TrackingRecord class and corresponds to one of the three kinds of track point that the runtime tracking infrastructure can match: an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>, or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Cada tipo de registro de rastreamento deriva da classe TrackingRecord e corresponde a um dos três tipos de ponto de controle que pode corresponder a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução: um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>, ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém a coleção de anotações associadas ao ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: You can specify annotations to be associated with an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar as anotações para ser associado um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>ou um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure stores these annotations, and, when it matches the track point, it returns them in Annotations.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução armazena essas anotações, e, quando ele corresponde ao ponto de controle, ele retorna em anotações.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref> that contains the annotations associated with the track point to which this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"></xref> corresponds.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"> </xref> que contém as anotações associadas ao ponto de controle para o qual este <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"> </xref> corresponde.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the event data, if any, that is associated with the tracking event that caused the tracking record to be sent.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém ou define os dados do evento, se houver, que é associada ao evento de controle que fez com que o registro de rastreamento a ser enviado.

trans-unit.source: Certain kinds of tracking events emitted by a workflow instance have event data associated with them.
trans-unit.target: Determinados tipos de rastreamento de eventos emitidos por uma instância de fluxo de trabalho tem dados de evento associados a eles.

trans-unit.source: If a tracking event has event data associated with it, the runtime tracking infrastructure puts the event data in EventArgs property of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Se um evento de rastreamento tiver dados de evento associados a ele, a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução coloca os dados de evento na propriedade EventArgs da classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: For example, when a workflow instance is terminated, the runtime tracking infrastructure sends a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> set to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> that contains information about the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando uma instância de fluxo de trabalho for encerrada, o tempo de execução controle infraestrutura envia um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>com <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>definido como um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>que contém informações sobre o motivo para a terminação.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that represents the event data, if any, that is associated with the tracking event that caused the tracking record to be sent.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que representa os dados do evento, se houver, que é associada ao evento de controle que fez com que o registro de rastreamento a ser enviado.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the time and date of the tracking event associated with the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém ou define a hora e data do evento de rastreamento associado com o registro de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> is Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DateTime>é o tempo Universal Coordenado (UTC).</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that indicates the date and time that the tracking event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DateTime>que indica a data e hora em que ocorreu o evento de rastreamento.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that indicates the order of the tracking event associated with the tracking record relative to the other tracking events emitted by the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém ou define um valor que indica a ordem do evento de rastreamento associado ao registro de controle em relação os outros eventos de rastreamento emitidas pela instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: EventOrder indicates the relative order of the tracking event within the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: EventOrder indica a ordem relativa do evento de rastreamento dentro da instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: EventOrder will be unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
trans-unit.target: EventOrder serão exclusivo em uma instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas não é garantido que ele seja sequencial.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the order of the tracking event relative to the other tracking events emitted by the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica a ordem dos eventos de controle em relação os outros eventos de rastreamento emitidas pela instância de fluxo de trabalho.
